entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git cd devops-deployment sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-fe.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-fe@sha256:1bdfc7365148b89a3be7061d389c893f1d0316ac112eaa724a79b6e298e7819b+g' ./swm-fe/Release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml sed -i "s/creationTimestamp:.*/creationTimestamp: '2023-03-05T15:21:17Z'/" ./swm-fe/Release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./swm-fe/Release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml git commit -m 'Done by Jenkins Job changemanifest: swm-fe:14' git push https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git HEAD:refs/heads/master rm -rf /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/swm-fe_Release/coyote/*
